Package com.thalesgroup.tmgsdk

Interface TokenBindingListener

  • public interface TokenBindingListener
    This callback is use to inform the VisaCTFHelper.createBinding(String, String, String, TokenBindingListener) process result.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onDeviceAuthentication​(DeviceAuthentication deviceAuthentication)
      Call back for App to indicate the device authentication such as Biometric or Keyguard authentication
      void onError​(TMGClientException exception)
      Call back for App to indicate token binding to device is successful
      void onIssuerAuthenticationError​(PendingBindingSession pendingBindingSession, TMGClientException tmgClientException)
      Call back for App to indicate activation is failure.
      void onIssuerAuthenticationReady​(PendingBindingSession pendingBindingSession, OtpActivationStatus otpActivationStatus)
      Call back for App to show the issuer activation screen to continue with the IDV process.
      void onIssuerAuthenticationRequired​(PendingBindingSession pendingBindingSession)
      Call back for App to indicate Activation is required when IDVMethod is chosen and sent to server.
      void onSuccess()
      Call back for App to indicate token binding to device is successful

    • Method Detail

      • onIssuerAuthenticationReady

        void onIssuerAuthenticationReady​(PendingBindingSession pendingBindingSession,
                                 @Nullable
                                 OtpActivationStatus otpActivationStatus)
        Call back for App to show the issuer activation screen to continue with the IDV process. Next step is to activate the pendingBindingSession with or without an OTP according to the select IDVMethod.
        Parameters:
        pendingBindingSession - Object to use for activation
        otpActivationStatus - otp activation status. In case of IDVType.APP_TO_APP, IDVType.CUSTOMER_SERVICE and IDVType.OUTBOUND_CALL this value will be null.

      • onIssuerAuthenticationRequired

        void onIssuerAuthenticationRequired​(PendingBindingSession pendingBindingSession)
        Call back for App to indicate Activation is required when IDVMethod is chosen and sent to server. Next step is to show the available IDVMethod and select one.
        Parameters:
        pendingBindingSession - Object to use for activation

      • onIssuerAuthenticationError

        void onIssuerAuthenticationError​(@Nullable
                                 PendingBindingSession pendingBindingSession,
                                 TMGClientException tmgClientException)
        Call back for App to indicate activation is failure. The binding session is kept opened and it is possible to retry.
        Parameters:
        pendingBindingSession - Object to use for activation. Returned when it is possible to retry the activation.
        tmgClientException - Returned error code and message

      • onDeviceAuthentication

        void onDeviceAuthentication​(DeviceAuthentication deviceAuthentication)
        Call back for App to indicate the device authentication such as Biometric or Keyguard authentication
        Parameters:
        deviceAuthentication - Object to start the authentication

      • onSuccess

        void onSuccess()
        Call back for App to indicate token binding to device is successful

      • onError

        void onError​(TMGClientException exception)
        Call back for App to indicate token binding to device is successful
